official_title: A bill to amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the prompt and orderly closure and transfer of Public Health Service hospitals and clinics.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to close or transfer all Public Health Service hospitals and other stations by September 30, 1982. Establishes an administrative unit within the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Health to oversee such activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the prompt and orderly closure and transfer of Public Health Service hospitals and clinics.
